body: I BUY THE GOLD BUT I CANT  PICK A PREMIUM KIT BUT IN THE CHAT PUT GOLD
body_tagged: I BUY THE GOLD BUT I CANT  PICK A PREMIUM KIT BUT IN THE CHAT PUT GOLD
title: HELP ME WITH THE GOLD RANK

replies.body: Are you sure the kits you are trying to use are premium?
replies.body_tagged: Are you sure the kits you are trying to use are premium?

replies.body: Some Kits are Premium but you need the level required to use them
replies.body_tagged: Some Kits are Premium but you need the level required to use them

replies.body:
Please Don't use full caps.
If your gold, you have access to a few kits.
The kit you may be trying to use must've been for a higher rank.
If you'd wish to upgrade please Visit Avicus.net/shop for more info.
Hope this Helped :)!

replies.body:
You need to reach the level of where you can unlock the premium kits.
Some premium kits are also for higher ranks.
